name: Jenny
text:
Jenny
Jenny was an employee in the perfume department at Horne's Department Store.
Biography
In February 1989, Jenny visited One Eyed Jacks.
The following week, after Audrey Horne excused herself to the restroom, Jenny was summoned to Emory Battis' office, where he gave her a unicorn figurine and offered her a hospitality position at One Eyed Jacks. Battis gave her a phone number for the "Black Rose."
Audrey – having spied on the meeting between Jenny and Battis – later asked Jenny for the number for the "Black Rose," claiming to have lost it.
